mapper.select: SELECT u.name, a.time, a.alarm_id as sourceAlarmId, ( SELECT t.message_template FROM alarm_message_template t WHERE t.category_id = a.category_id AND t.time_label = #{timeLabel} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) AS messageTemplate FROM alarm a INNER JOIN User u ON a.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE a.creator_id != #{userId} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
